dot:
digraph SQLiteOptimization{rankdir=TB; node[shape=box, style=filled, fillcolor=lightblue]; SQLite[label="SQLite: A B-tree on disk, row-based storage
Used for OLTP workloads"];Research[label="Research by University of Wisconsin-Madison

Contains analytical queries with joins"]; SlowSQLite[label="SQLite Performance Issues

- Nested Loop Joins
- Hash Joins
- Sort-Merge Join"]; Optimization[label="Optimization Techniques

- Implement Bloom Filters"];BloomFilters[label="Bloom Filters

- Fits in CPU cache
- Easy to implement"]; Results[label="Results

- Applied in SQLite v3.38.0"]; SQLite->Research;Research->Benchmark;Research->SlowSQLite;SlowSQLite->JoinMethods;JoinMethods->Optimization;Optimization->BloomFilters;BloomFilters->Results;}
